macro: Regime remains conditional risk-on: opportunities persist, but policy and real-yield shocks require evidence-weighted sizing and strict invalidation discipline.
policy: Trade/industrial policy uncertainty is still the fastest path into valuation and guidance risk; treat medium-sized policy frictions as cumulative macro pressure.
delta: Alpha layers refreshed (market data/catalysts/evidence/signal v0.2), deep-dive routing uses HIGH + unusual-move + near-catalyst logic with breaking-news persistence tracking in state.
